summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals, likely prosecutors or investigators, regarding scheduling an interview with a former house manager of Jeffrey Epstein in New York. The purpose of the interview is to identify other employees and gather information about activities at Epstein's house.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the employer of the house manager who is the subject of the planned interview.

events.title: Email exchange about interview scheduling
events.description: An email is sent discussing the scheduling of an interview with Epstein's former house manager.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated September 16, 2019.
It discusses plans to interview Jeffrey Epstein's long-time house manager in New York.
The purpose of the interview is to identify other employees and gather information about activities at Epstein's house.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
